thread.section_title: iFlyBusiness Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of iFlyBusiness | iflybusiness.com
thread.title: Rosanna Myres

author: Rosanna Myres
title: Rosanna Myres
text:
Matt Meyer did a great job getting us the best flights at the best price. He was up against two other wholesale flight brokers. from different companies. Matt always responded quickly to our questions and as I said had the best price for the same flights as other brokers were quoting. This is our first time using iFlyBusiness, but there's no doubt we'll be back for our next trip. I've already recommended him to three friends. Thanks Matt!
Rosanna
